title: Font ID help!
content:
Hello!  
Can anyone help me guess this font? It matches a Swiss font, but the C is distinctive. Can anyone guess what it is?

Thank you,  
Hala

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416024615im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4727_4575.JPG)

Font: 

 Univers 

Solved By: 

 [Jan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416024615/http:/typophile.com/user/17243 "View user profile.")
author: Primehunter

comments.content: Swiss is correct. It’s [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416024615/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/). Might be Bold Condensed squooshed a bit (extended).
